column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered Los Drowned
column3: and a fried chicken salad. Those are tasting good. The bread of burger and sandwich is awesome. I am also amazed with the juicy steak in my burger. My friend is satisfied with the Los Drowned. Our server is nice and patient
column4: willing to accommodate our allergy concern. Everyone seems happy here. I like the atmosphere
column5: the only concern is that you need to speak loud here
column6: or you cannot hear what your friend talked.
